description: Perched high on the tufa cliffs overlooking the Costa degli Dei, this contemporary-style restaurant boasts superb views from its dining room and especially from its panoramic summer terrace. The cuisine served by the young owner-chef is as modern as the setting – dishes are light and almost exclusively focused on local fish.
